quote: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: Courage is found in unlikely places.
name: J. R. R. Tolkien

quote: All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
name: Walt Disney

quote: All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination.
name: Earl Nightingale

quote: The secret to happiness is freedom... And the secret to freedom is courage.
name: Thucydides

quote: Mistakes are always forgivable, if one has the courage to admit them.
name: Bruce Lee

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Never bend your head. Always hold it high. Look the world straight in the eye.
name: Helen Keller

quote: Courage is fire, and bullying is smoke.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: Wisdom, compassion, and courage are the three universally recognized moral qualities of men.
name: Confucius

quote: If you have no confidence in self, you are twice defeated in the race of life.
name: Marcus Garvey

quote: Courage is like love; it must have hope for nourishment.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
name: Muhammad Ali

quote: Courage is knowing what not to fear.
name: Plato

quote: Jump, and you will find out how to unfold your wings as you fall.
name: Ray Bradbury

quote: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
name: Winston Churchill

quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
name: e. e. cummings

quote: The eagle has no fear of adversity. We need to be like the eagle and have a fearless spirit of a conqueror!
name: Joyce Meyer

quote: Efforts and courage are not enough without purpose and direction.
name: John F. Kennedy

quote: Only those who will risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.
name: T. S. Eliot

quote: Courage is grace under pressure.
name: Ernest Hemingway

quote: We must build dikes of courage to hold back the flood of fear.
name: Martin Luther King, Jr.

quote: The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: I think we all have empathy. We may not have enough courage to display it.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Courtesy is as much a mark of a gentleman as courage.
name: Theodore Roosevelt

quote: Courage is contagious. When a brave man takes a stand, the spines of others are often stiffened.
name: Billy Graham

quote: It takes a great deal of bravery to stand up to our enemies, but just as much to stand up to our friends.
name: J. K. Rowling

quote: From caring comes courage.
name: Lao Tzu

quote: Honest conviction is my courage; the Constitution is my guide.
name: Andrew Johnson

quote: Let us not pray to be sheltered from dangers but to be fearless when facing them.
name: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: In the Soviet army it takes more courage to retreat than advance.
name: Joseph Stalin

quote: What would life be if we had no courage to attempt anything?
name: Vincent Van Gogh

quote: Man cannot discover new oceans unless he has the courage to lose sight of the shore.
name: Andre Gide

quote: Hope lies in dreams, in imagination, and in the courage of those who dare to make dreams into reality.
name: Jonas Salk

quote: Courage is being scared to death... and saddling up anyway.
name: John Wayne

quote: The best protection any woman can have... is courage.
name: Elizabeth Cady Stanton

quote: The opposite for courage is not cowardice, it is conformity. Even a dead fish can go with the flow.
name: Jim Hightower

quote: Success is never final, failure is never fatal. It's courage that counts.
name: John Wooden

quote: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point.
name: C. S. Lewis

quote: I'm grateful to God for His bountiful gifts... He gave me courage and faith in myself.
name: Loretta Young

quote: It is curious that physical courage should be so common in the world and moral courage so rare.
name: Mark Twain

quote: Either you decide to stay in the shallow end of the pool or you go out in the ocean.
name: Christopher Reeve

quote: To see the right and not to do it is cowardice.
name: Confucius

quote: Courage is the first of human qualities because it is the quality which guarantees the others.
name: Aristotle

quote: Courageous people do not fear forgiving, for the sake of peace.
name: Nelson Mandela

quote: Bravery is the capacity to perform properly even when scared half to death.
name: Omar N. Bradley

quote: Courage, above all things, is the first quality of a warrior.
name: Carl von Clausewitz

quote: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.
name: Amelia Earhart

quote: Valor is stability, not of legs and arms, but of courage and the soul.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Change takes courage.
name: Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez

quote: Those who lack the courage will always find a philosophy to justify it.
name: Albert Camus

quote: Creativity takes courage.
name: Henri Matisse

quote: The first virtue in a soldier is endurance of fatigue; courage is only the second virtue.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: To create one's world in any of the arts takes courage.
name: Georgia O'Keeffe

quote: Courage, my friends; 'tis not too late to build a better world.
name: Tommy Douglas

quote: Failure is unimportant. It takes courage to make a fool of yourself.
name: Charlie Chaplin

quote: God grant me the courage not to give up what I think is right even though I think it is hopeless.
name: Chester W. Nimitz

quote: Healing takes courage, and we all have courage, even if we have to dig a little to find it.
name: Tori Amos

quote: We want deeper sincerity of motive, a greater courage in speech and earnestness in action.
name: Sarojini Naidu

quote: He who is brave is free.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: Courage is fear holding on a minute longer.
name: George S. Patton

quote: He is a man of courage who does not run away, but remains at his post and fights against the enemy.
name: Socrates

quote: Faced with what is right, to leave it undone shows a lack of courage.
name: Confucius

quote: You must study to be frank with the world: Frankness is the child of honesty and courage.
name: Robert E. Lee

quote: True courage is like a kite; a contrary wind raises it higher.
name: John Petit-Senn

quote: Genius is talent set on fire by courage.
name: Henry Van Dyke

quote: The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
name: Coco Chanel

quote: To see what is right and not to do it is want of courage, or of principle.
name: Confucius

quote: How few there are who have courage enough to own their faults, or resolution enough to mend them.
name: Benjamin Franklin

quote: To have courage for whatever comes in life - everything lies in that.
name: Saint Teresa of Avila

quote: Fearlessness is not only possible, it is the ultimate joy. When you touch nonfear, you are free.
name: Thich Nhat Hanh

quote: It takes a lot of courage to show your dreams to someone else.
name: Erma Bombeck

quote: Part of courage is simple consistency.
name: Peggy Noonan

quote: If you could get up the courage to begin, you have the courage to succeed.
name: David Viscott

quote: Optimism is essential to achievement and it is also the foundation of courage and true progress.
name: Nicholas M. Butler

quote: He who has courage and faith will never perish in misery!
name: Anne Frank

quote: Courage - a perfect sensibility of the measure of danger, and a mental willingness to endure it.
name: William Tecumseh Sherman

quote: Courage is a kind of salvation.
name: Plato

quote: I know of no higher fortitude than stubborness in the face of overwhelming odds.
name: Louis Nizer

quote: I beg you take courage; the brave soul can mend even disaster.
name: Catherine the Great

quote: True courage is being afraid, and going ahead and doing your job anyhow, that's what courage is.
name: Norman Schwarzkopf

quote: The weak in courage is strong in cunning.
name: William Blake

quote: Courage, not compromise, brings the smile of God's approval.
name: Thomas S. Monson

quote: The enchanting charms of this sublime science reveal only to those who have the courage to go deeply into it.
name: Carl Friedrich Gauss

quote: I tend to think you're fearless when you recognize why you should be scared of things, but do them anyway.
name: Christian Bale

quote: Boldness be my friend.
name: William Shakespeare

quote: One man with courage is a majority.
name: Thomas Jefferson

quote: Fate loves the fearless.
name: James Russell Lowell

quote: A team is where a boy can prove his courage on his own. A gang is where a coward goes to hide.
name: Mickey Mantle

quote: Courage! I have shown it for years; think you I shall lose it at the moment when my sufferings are to end?
name: Marie Antoinette

quote: If one suffers we all suffer. Togetherness is strength. Courage.
name: Jean-Bertrand Aristide

quote: Always be courageous and strong, and don't fear.
name: Gabby Douglas

quote: Bravery is being the only one who knows you're afraid.
name: Franklin P. Jones

quote: There is nothing in the world so much admired as a man who knows how to bear unhappiness with courage.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: To be a Bond girl you need courage, charm, determination and feistiness.
name: Olga Kurylenko

quote: It takes vision and courage to create - it takes faith and courage to prove.
name: Owen D. Young

quote: Courage is very important. Like a muscle, it is strengthened by use.
name: Ruth Gordon

quote: Courage without conscience is a wild beast.
name: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: No man in the world has more courage than the man who can stop after eating one peanut.
name: Channing Pollock

quote: Way down deep, we're all motivated by the same urges. Cats have the courage to live by them.
name: Jim Davis

quote: To live we must conquer incessantly, we must have the courage to be happy.
name: Henri Frederic Amiel

quote: Work on something that matters. Have courage.
name: Ginni Rometty

quote: To me, there is no greater act of courage than being the one who kisses first.
name: Janeane Garofalo

quote: I admire the courage and self-reliance it takes to start your own business and make it succeed.
name: Martha Stewart

quote: Peace is a fragile thing. It takes courage to secure it. It takes wisdom to maintain it.
name: Jenny Shipley

quote: History, despite its wrenching pain, cannot be unlived, but if faced with courage, need not be lived again.
name: Maya Angelou

quote: Untutored courage is useless in the face of educated bullets.
name: George S. Patton

quote: Freedom is the sure possession of those alone who have the courage to defend it.
name: Pericles

quote: Life shrinks or expands in proportion to one's courage.
name: Anais Nin

quote: There is in true beauty, as in courage, something which narrow souls cannot dare to admire.
name: William Congreve

quote: Sometimes even to live is an act of courage.
name: Lucius Annaeus Seneca

quote: The kind of beauty I want most is the hard-to-get kind that comes from within - strength, courage, dignity.
name: Ruby Dee

quote: There is hope in dreams, imagination, and in the courage of those who wish to make those dreams a reality.
name: Jonas Salk

quote: The principal act of courage is to endure and withstand dangers doggedly rather than to attack them.
name: Thomas Aquinas

quote: Change will never happen when people lack the ability and courage to see themselves for who they are.
name: Bryant H. McGill

quote: The courage to be is the courage to accept oneself, in spite of being unacceptable.
name: Paul Tillich

quote: Curiosity, rationalization, and laziness are no match against courage, self-control, and mental toughness.
name: John Bytheway

quote: Optimism is the foundation of courage.
name: Nicholas M. Butler

quote: Most of us have far more courage than we ever dreamed we possessed.
name: Dale Carnegie

quote: Unless a reviewer has the courage to give you unqualified praise, I say ignore the bastard.
name: John Steinbeck

quote: Despair gives courage to a coward.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: Courage is doing what you are afraid to do. There can be no courage unless you are scared.
name: Eddie Rickenbacker

quote: Discouragement is not the absence of adequacy but the absence of courage.
name: Neal A. Maxwell

quote: A leader must have the courage to act against an expert's advice.
name: James Callaghan

quote: Men create real miracles when they use their God-given courage and intelligence.
name: Jean Anouilh

quote: Men was formed for society, and is neither capable of living alone, nor has the courage to do it.
name: William Blackstone

quote: When God speaks, oftentimes His voice will call for an act of courage on our part.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: You have to have courage to be obedient to God.
name: Charles Stanley

quote: The paradox of courage is that a man must be a little careless of his life even in order to keep it.
name: Gilbert K. Chesterton

quote: Is he alone who has courage on his right hand and faith on his left hand?
name: Charles Lindbergh

quote: Individual courage is the only interesting thing in life.
name: Simone Signoret

quote: It takes courage to be an entrepreneur.
name: Adam Neumann

quote: More firm and sure the hand of courage strikes, when it obeys the watchful eye of caution.
name: James Thomson

quote: I have always had the courage for the new things that life sometimes offers.
name: Wallis Simpson

quote: I feel quite fearless protecting the people I love.
name: Paloma Faith

quote: It often takes more courage to change one's opinion than to keep it.
name: Willy Brandt

quote: I try to be a truthful artist and I try to show a level of courage. I enjoy that. I'm a messenger.
name: Jeff Koons

quote: It takes a certain courage and a certain greatness to be truly base.
name: Jean Anouilh

quote: Cold and fire has a way of creeping into the tiniest crack in your courage and finding that coward.
name: Tim Kennedy

quote: Good courage in a bad affair is half of the evil overcome.
name: Plautus

quote: The only courage that matters is the kind that gets you from one moment to the next.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: If human beings had genuine courage, they'd wear their costumes every day of the year, not just on Halloween.
name: Douglas Coupland

quote: Who could refrain that had a heart to love and in that heart courage to make love known?
name: William Shakespeare

quote: Creativity requires the courage to let go of certainties.
name: Erich Fromm

quote: Courage in danger is half the battle.
name: Plautus

quote: Courage is a mean with regard to fear and confidence.
name: Aristotle

quote: Every man has his own courage, and is betrayed because he seeks in himself the courage of other persons.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Physical bravery is an animal instinct; moral bravery is much higher and truer courage.
name: Wendell Phillips

quote: A great part of courage is the courage of having done the thing before.
name: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You will always be fond of me. I represent to you all the sins you have never had the courage to commit.
name: Oscar Wilde

quote: The opposite of courage in our society is not cowardice, it is conformity.
name: Rollo May

quote: Courage doesn't come by doing what everybody else says. Courage does by what you know is right.
name: Nikki Haley

quote: Real nobility is based on scorn, courage, and profound indifference.
name: Albert Camus

quote: If you are lucky enough to find a way of life you love, you have to find the courage to live it.
name: John Irving

quote: Courage means standing next to someone you don't always agree with for the betterment of the country.
name: Amy Klobuchar

quote: I never thought much of the courage of a lion tamer. Inside the cage he is at least safe from people.
name: George Bernard Shaw

quote: Australia is a nation of compassion. Courage and compassion. And the third of these great values: resilience.
name: Kevin Rudd

quote: Time is neutral and does not change things. With courage and initiative, leaders change things.
name: Jesse Jackson

quote: A lot of people do not muster the courage to live their dreams because they are afraid to die.
name: Les Brown

quote: Just as courage imperils life, fear protects it.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Courage is on display every day, and only the courageous wring the most out of life.
name: Zig Ziglar

quote: It is only necessary to have courage, for strength without self-confidence is useless.
name: Giacomo Casanova

quote: Let us go forth with fear and courage and rage to save the world.
name: Grace Paley

quote: It requires more courage to suffer than to die.
name: Napoleon Bonaparte

quote: I have a lot of things to prove to myself. One is that I can live my life fearlessly.
name: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Do not lose courage in considering your own imperfections.
name: Saint Francis de Sales

quote: Just as courage is the danger of life, so is fear its safeguard.
name: Leonardo da Vinci

quote: Keep your fears to yourself, but share your courage with others.
name: Robert Louis Stevenson

quote: A man of courage is also full of faith.
name: Marcus Tullius Cicero

quote: Everyone has talent. What is rare is the courage to follow the talent to the dark place where it leads.
name: Erica Jong

quote: I want to grow old without facelifts. I want to have the courage to be loyal to the face I have made.
name: Marilyn Monroe

quote: Have the courage to act instead of react.
name: Oliver Wendell Holmes, Sr.

quote: Believers, look up - take courage. The angels are nearer than you think.
name: Billy Graham

quote: It is a wise man who knows where courage ends and stupidity begins.
name: Jerome Cady

quote: It takes as much courage to have tried and failed as it does to have tried and succeeded.
name: Anne Morrow Lindbergh

quote: The only reason I'm in Hollywood is that I don't have the moral courage to refuse the money.
name: Marlon Brando

quote: Well, I think that - I think leadership's always been about two main things: imagination and courage.
name: Paul Keating

quote: Have the courage to face a difficulty lest it kick you harder than you bargain for.
name: Stanislaus I

quote: Courage is being afraid but going on anyhow.
name: Dan Rather

quote: Courage is the ladder on which all the other virtues mount.
name: Clare Boothe Luce

quote: Decision is a risk rooted in the courage of being free.
name: Paul Tillich

quote: Religion in its humility restores man to his only dignity, the courage to live by grace.
name: George Santayana

quote: The courage to imagine the otherwise is our greatest resource, adding color and suspense to all our life.
name: Daniel J. Boorstin

quote: I've always been independent. I've always had courage. But I didn't always own my diabetes.
name: Mary Tyler Moore

quote: Life is to be entered upon with courage.
name: Alexis de Tocqueville

quote: To persevere, trusting in what hopes he has, is courage in a man.
name: Euripides

quote: People with courage and character always seem sinister to the rest.
name: Hermann Hesse

quote: Valor grows by daring, fear by holding back.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: Valor lies just halfway between rashness and cowardice.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: It takes a lot of courage to face up to things you can't do because we feed ourselves so much denial.
name: Zoe Saldana

quote: True courage is a result of reasoning. A brave mind is always impregnable.
name: Jeremy Collier

quote: Political courage is not political suicide.
name: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: Women have to summon up courage to fulfill dormant dreams.
name: Alice Walker

quote: If we survive danger it steels our courage more than anything else.
name: Reinhold Niebuhr

quote: Courage and grace are a formidable mixture. The only place to see it is in the bullring.
name: Marlene Dietrich

quote: Courage can't see around corners but goes around them anyway.
name: Mignon McLaughlin

quote: Keep courage. Whatever you do, do not feel sorry for yourself. You will win in a great age of opportunity.
name: Richard L. Evans

quote: He who loses wealth loses much; he who loses a friend loses more; but he that loses his courage loses all.
name: Miguel de Cervantes

quote: A man of courage never needs weapons, but he may need bail.
name: Lewis Mumford

quote: Success is that old ABC - ability, breaks, and courage.
name: Charles Luckman

quote: With enough courage, you can do without a reputation.
name: Margaret Mitchell

quote: Without courage, wisdom bears no fruit.
name: Baltasar Gracian

quote: So the brother in black offers to these United States the source of courage that endures, and laughter.
name: Zora Neale Hurston

quote: Courage is not the absence of despair; it is, rather, the capacity to move ahead in spite of despair.
name: Rollo May

quote: You will find as you grow older that courage is the rarest of all qualities to be found in public life.
name: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: I learned that moral courage is harder than physical courage.
name: Tim O'Brien

quote: Every man of courage is a man of his word.
name: Pierre Corneille

quote: He that fails in his endeavors after wealth or power will not long retain either honesty or courage.
name: Samuel Johnson

quote: I'm sick of not having the courage to be an absolute nobody.
name: J. D. Salinger

quote: A timid person is frightened before a danger, a coward during the time, and a courageous person afterward.
name: Jean Paul

quote: Whatever enlarges hope will also exalt courage.
name: William Samuel Johnson

quote: Falsehood is cowardice, the truth courage.
name: Hosea Ballou

quote: The man who has the courage of his platitudes is always a successful man.
name: Van Wyck Brooks

quote: The strangest, most generous, and proudest of all virtues is true courage.
name: Michel de Montaigne

quote: Patience, that blending of moral courage with physical timidity.
name: Thomas Hardy

quote: What we want from modern dance is courage and audacity.
name: Twyla Tharp

quote: Courage breeds leadership.
name: Nikki Haley

quote: Courage is the art of being the only one who knows you're scared to death.
name: Earl Wilson

quote: You can't test courage cautiously.
name: Annie Dillard

quote: Audacity augments courage; hesitation, fear.
name: Publilius Syrus

quote: 'White Material' is about courage and craziness.
name: Claire Denis

quote: The courage we desire and prize is not the courage to die decently, but to live manfully.
name: Thomas Carlyle

quote: War is fear cloaked in courage.
name: William Westmoreland

quote: Nothing gives a fearful man more courage than another's fear.
name: Umberto Eco

quote: The trials on the road to world harmony are no greater than the courage of those who accept the challenge.
name: Carl Lewis

quote: Courage to be is the key to revelatory power of the feminist revolution.
name: Mary Daly

quote: Conscience is the root of all true courage; if a man would be brave let him obey his conscience.
name: James Freeman Clarke

quote: The courage of very ordinary people is all that stands between us and the dark.
name: Pam Brown

quote: People don't follow titles, they follow courage.
name: William Wells Brown

quote: What is more mortifying than to feel that you have missed the plum for want of courage to shake the tree?
name: Logan Pearsall Smith

quote: Real courage is knowing what faces you and knowing how to face it.
name: Timothy Dalton

quote: Courage is the birthplace of confidence.
name: Debbie Millman

quote: It takes a great deal of courage to follow another person's lead.
name: Bill Hybels

quote: When you love someone deeply, you give strength, and when you are loved deeply, you gain courage.
name: Scott Cook

quote: My talent is such that no undertaking, however vast in size... has ever surpassed my courage.
name: Peter Paul Rubens

quote: War paralyzes your courage and deadens the spirit of true manhood.
name: Alexander Berkman

quote: Limit to courage? There is no limit to courage.
name: Gabriele D'Annunzio

quote: The courage to be is rooted in the God who appears when God has disappeared in the anxiety of doubt.
name: Paul Tillich

quote: Who asks whether the enemy was defeated by strategy or valor?
name: Virgil

quote: It is right to endure with resignation what the gods send, and to face one's enemies with courage.
name: Pericles

quote: Believe in individual initiatives, in courage, in risk.
name: Emmanuel Macron

quote: The courage of the poet is to keep ajar the door that leads into madness.
name: Christopher Morley

quote: Hope, like faith, is nothing if it is not courageous; it is nothing if it is not ridiculous.
name: Thornton Wilder

quote: True courage is not the brutal force of vulgar heroes, but the firm resolve of virtue and reason.
name: Alfred North Whitehead

quote: The more wit the less courage.
name: Thomas Fuller

quote: Courage consists not in blindly overlooking danger, but in seeing it, and conquering it.
name: Jean Paul

quote: Courage is often lack of insight, whereas cowardice in many cases is based on good information.
name: Peter Ustinov

quote: Never undertake anything for which you wouldn't have the courage to ask the blessings of heaven.
name: Georg C. Lichtenberg

quote: Courage is the capacity to confront what can be imagined.
name: Leo Rosten

quote: Courage is simply the willingness to be afraid and act anyway.
name: Robert Anthony

quote: We are telling the American people to have patience, courage, resolve and determination.
name: Muammar al-Gaddafi

quote: Perfect courage is to do without witnesses what one would be capable of doing with the world looking on.
name: Francois de La Rochefoucauld

quote: Until the day of his death, no man can be sure of his courage.
name: Jean Anouilh

quote: Acting is really about having the courage to fail in front of people.
name: Adam Driver

quote: Courage is soldiers fighting on the front line, or people living on the bread line.
name: Hugh Grant

quote: Farrah Fawcett had courage, she had strength, and she had faith.
name: Jaclyn Smith

quote: What you learn from studying acting is that you have to have the courage to just make strong choices.
name: Sarah Rafferty

quote: Freedom is a system based on courage.
name: Charles Peguy

quote: Your determination, selflessness and courage have brought the freedom struggle towards its fulfilment.
name: Gerry Adams

quote: Creating art is painful. It takes time, practice, and the courage to stand alone.
name: Maria Semple

quote: I can muster up the courage in the difficult situations to get me through.
name: Megyn Kelly

quote: A wise woman knows how to summon her courage and do what is right, rather than what is easy.
name: Suze Orman

quote: Morality may consist solely in the courage of making a choice.
name: Leon Blum

quote: I'll know how to die with courage; that is easier than living.
name: Georg Buchner

quote: The courage in journalism is sticking up for the unpopular, not the popular.
name: Geraldo Rivera

quote: Leadership requires the courage to make decisions that will benefit the next generation.
name: Alan Autry

quote: Ingenuity, plus courage, plus work, equals miracles.
name: Bob Richards

quote: One has to have the courage of one's pessimism.
name: Ian Mcewan

quote: It would be sad if we lost our instinct and our courage to love and protect.
name: Emeli Sande

quote: Design is the courage and brilliance to cover an original and make it different.
name: John Hockenberry

quote: Happy are those who dare courageously to defend what they love.
name: Ovid

quote: Courage conquers all things: it even gives strength to the body.
name: Ovid

quote: Either life entails courage, or it ceases to be life.
name: E. M. Forster

quote: There are pretenders to piety as well as to courage.
name: Moliere

quote: In strife who inquires whether stratagem or courage was used?
name: Virgil

quote: Lily Tomlin was one of the early comedy greats who influenced my courage to be the person I am.
name: Tracee Ellis Ross

quote: I've been through it all, baby, I'm mother courage.
name: Elizabeth Taylor

quote: Let us answer the terrorists by living our values with courage.
name: Angela Merkel

quote: Clear thinking requires courage rather than intelligence.
name: Thomas Szasz

quote: Every day begins with an act of courage and hope: getting out of bed.
name: Mason Cooley

quote: Courage consists not in hazarding without fear; but being resolutely minded in a just cause.
name: Plutarch

quote: Enthusiasm is a form of social courage.
name: Gretchen Rubin

quote: I had to find the courage to turn my life around.
name: Nikki Sixx

quote: I love Joan Collins. She's a wonderful lady. She has such courage. She's such a good actress.
name: Robert Wagner

quote: What separated Ed Murrow from the rest of the pack was courage.
name: Dan Rather

quote: The courage of a soldier is found to be the cheapest and most common quality of human nature.
name: Edward Gibbon

quote: Fashion should not be expected to serve in the stead of courage or character.
name: Loretta Young

quote: The only reason courage exists is because sometimes it is required.
name: Andy Dunn

quote: I don't understand why people say that I am full of courage. I feel terribly nervous.
name: Aung San Suu Kyi

quote: Poetry gives us courage and sets us straight with the world. Poems are great companions and friends.
name: David Whyte

quote: You cannot build character and courage by taking away a man's initiative and independence.
name: William J. H. Boetcker

quote: You cannot build character and courage by destroying men's initiative and independence.
name: William J. H. Boetcker

quote: Courage easily finds its own eloquence.
name: Plautus

quote: Courage is heartworth making itself felt in deeds. It never waits for chances; it makes chances.
name: George Matthew Adams

quote: It takes courage to know when you ought to be afraid.
name: James A. Michener

quote: Deep Throat's information, and in my view, courage, allowed the newspaper to use what he knew and suspected.
name: Bob Woodward

quote: I would kiss you, had I the courage.
name: Edouard Manet

quote: Courage is just fear, plus prayers, plus understanding.
name: Edward Albert

quote: It's a courageous thing to do something that doesn't have rules or limits.
name: Vanessa Paradis

quote: Courage is action, not talk.
name: Jeff Rich

quote: At the same time, I would add that the American people have a lot of courage.
name: Tadao Ando

quote: What I like most about Bolano is his courage.
name: Sam Shepard

quote: I have the courage of my convictions.
name: Brigitte Bardot

quote: We live in a world in which courage is in less supply than genius.
name: Peter Thiel

quote: I want to thank the Academy for its courage and generosity.
name: Elia Kazan

quote: Most men, I think, wonder about their courage. How would they act in combat? Under torture?
name: Richard Cohen

quote: It takes a lot of courage in that cage no matter who you are.
name: Rose Namajunas

quote: Living authentically isn't an act of courage as much as an act of survival.
name: Sarah McBride

quote: Pugnacity is a form of courage, but a very bad form.
name: Sinclair Lewis

quote: I saw a complete lack of courage in Washington to tackle some of our biggest challenges.
name: Valerie Jarrett

quote: It is the mainspring of life, courage. And courage has many faces.
name: Oriana Fallaci

quote: To find the courage to do what I want to do for myself has been hard.
name: Brie Larson

quote: Necessity does the work of courage.
name: Nicholas M. Butler

quote: Smart growth is having the courage to say yes and having the courage to say no.
name: Tom Perez

quote: You can always find a reason to say no. It's the easiest vote. It's also not exactly a red badge of courage.
name: John Cornyn

quote: Grave was the man in years, in looks, in word, his locks were grey, yet was his courage green.
name: Torquato Tasso

quote: It takes great courage to be vulnerable. It takes enormous strength to be a real woman.
name: John Eldredge

quote: Where a man's strength and courage is tested most is in the way that he treats women - the way that he loves.
name: John Eldredge

quote: One of the marks of a gift is to have the courage of it.
name: Katherine Anne Porter

quote: You have to do what you need to do as an artist. You have to have that courage.
name: Liz Phair

quote: It shows more courage to leave the house as a trans person than Trump has ever had to show.
name: Gus Kenworthy

quote: Courage is never to let your actions be influenced by your fears.
name: Arthur Koestler

quote: In all the writers I admire, the common detonator is their courage to walk naked.
name: Richard Flanagan

quote: Courage is the fear of being thought a coward.
name: Horace Smith

quote: I regained my courage because of the fans who showed their support, asking me to keep singing.
name: Jessica Jung

quote: I tell people that we must have the courage to share what we feel, but no one follows me.
name: Tadashi Yanai

quote: If one girl with courage is a revolution, imagine what feats we can achieve together.
name: Queen Rania of Jordan

quote: I challenge us all to have the courage of our convictions to fight for a fair, justice and inclusive society.
name: Opal Tometi

quote: We don't talk about courage much in our everyday conversations, but I am comfortable with it now.
name: Victoria Pendleton

quote: Nothing gives us courage more readily than the desire to avoid looking like a damn fool.
name: Dean Koontz

quote: Have the courage of your desire.
name: George Gissing

quote: A man of courage flees forward, in the midst of new things.
name: Jacques Maritain

quote: I always disliked dogs, those protectors of cowards who lack the courage to fight an assailant themselves.
name: August Strindberg

quote: Speaking up for the truth isn't always easy. It takes courage, but it's necessary.
name: Amber Valletta

quote: Courage is always rewarded.
name: Kenny Loggins

quote: I like to go see films that give me courage and hope.
name: Isabelle Adjani

quote: Yes, you must have the courage of being free.
name: Jose Carreras

quote: Moral courage is higher and a rarer virtue than physical courage.
name: William Slim

quote: I have a lot of courage. I'm a realist.
name: Elisabeth Rohm

quote: So many times I wanted to go to Auschwitz, but I couldn't take up the courage to go there.
name: Frank Lowy

quote: It takes some courage to say you were wrong.
name: Carl Hart

quote: Poetry takes courage because you have to face things and you try to articulate how you feel.
name: Edward Hirsch

quote: It takes a great deal of courage to give me a public shout out, that's for sure.
name: Mike Cernovich

quote: Often the test of courage is not to die but to live.
name: Vittorio Alfieri

quote: Ofttimes the test of courage becomes rather to live than to die.
name: Vittorio Alfieri

quote: Courage doesn't grow overnight. It can be a long process.
name: Greta Gerwig

quote: Being gifted needs courage.
name: Georg Brandes

quote: Our film examines the heroism, courage and prowess of the Soviet submarine force in ways never seen before.
name: Kathryn Bigelow

quote: I would love to be a Franciscan brother. I'm just not sure I have the courage to do it.
name: Rich Mullins

quote: Courage ought to have eyes as well as arms.
name: Henry George Bohn

quote: Any real piece of writing is an act of courage.
name: Amitava Kumar

quote: I know what real courage is, and I understand true compassion.
name: Mo Yan

quote: The world will step aside for nearly anyone who has the courage of his of her opinions.
name: George Weinberg
